fields.name: Background
fields.description: * The content or research background.

fields.name: Methods
fields.description: * The methodology employed for the study or research. Describe how the data was collected.

fields.name: Data Description
fields.description: * Describe the data, and how the files are named and structured.

fields.name: Usage Notes
fields.description: * How the data is to be used. List external documentation pages. List related software developed for the dataset, and any special software required to use the data.

fields.name: Conflicts of Interest
fields.description: * List whether any authors have a financial, commercial, legal, or professional relationship with other organizations, or with the people working with them, that could influence this research. State explicitly if there are none.

fields.name: Background
fields.description: * The content or research background.

fields.name: Software Description
fields.description: * Describe the software in this project.

fields.name: Technical Implementation
fields.description: Details on the technical implementation. ie. the development process, and the underlying algorithms.

fields.name: Usage Notes
fields.description: * How the software is to be used. List some example function calls or specify the demo file(s).

fields.name: Installation and Requirements
fields.description: * Instructions on how to install the software, along with the required dependencies. Or specify the files in which they are listed.

fields.name: Conflicts of Interest
fields.description: * List whether any authors have a financial, commercial, legal, or professional relationship with other organizations, or with the people working with them, that could influence this research. State explicitly if there are none.

fields.name: Objective
fields.description: * An introduction to the challenge and a description of the objective/s.

fields.name: Participation
fields.description: * A timeline for the challenge and rules for participation.

fields.name: Data Description
fields.description: * A description of the challenge data and access details.

fields.name: Evaluation
fields.description: * Scoring details, information on submitting an entry, and a link to a sample submission.

fields.name: Conflicts of Interest
fields.description: * List whether any authors have a financial, commercial, legal, or professional relationship with other organizations, or with the people working with them, that could influence this research. State explicitly if there are none.

fields.name: Background
fields.description: * The content or research background.

fields.name: Technical Implementation
fields.description: Details on the technical implementation. ie. the development process, and the underlying algorithms.

fields.name: Model Description
fields.description: * Describe the model and any supporting data and software.

fields.name: Usage Notes
fields.description: * Describe how you intend others to (re)use the model.

fields.name: Installation and Requirements
fields.description: * Instructions on how to set up a software environment for using the model.

fields.name: Conflicts of Interest
fields.description: * List whether any authors have a financial, commercial, legal, or professional relationship with other organizations, or with the people working with them, that could influence this research. State explicitly if there are none.
